desc: Whoopee! disposable and reusable pee funnels help you answer nature's call when you're on the go. dirty bathrooms, outhouses, post-surgery, accessibility, hikes, road trips, camping and more. Whoopee! makes it easy to get going.

layout.text: It's an expression of joy, of wild abandon and fun. Whoopee! funnels are designed so you can focus on the good parts and know that you have options when nature calls. Use Whoopee! when you’re travelling, camping, hiking, at concerts and festivals…the possibilities are endless. Imagine standing tall to take a whiz, surveying the majesty of nature before you instead of going cheek to cheek with a thistle patch. Use Whoopee! anywhere, any time you can’t or won’t sit – grubby public toilets, sore joints, post-surgery, porta-potties, at home or on the go. Yeah, pee funnels are kind of weird. Awesome weird. Go anywhere, do anything weird. Don’t have to stand in a long line to use a filthy outhouse weird. Don’t hover. Whoopee!
